title: Netflix Project
description: Built a Netflix-inspired project allowing users to save favorite movies, featuring user authentication with login and registration functionalities.

title: Bank Time Application
description: This project, part of my C++ course for booking tasks and services. It allows users to easily schedule appointments, and manage bookings. The project demonstrates my C++ skills in creating practical solutions.

title: GFCC Website
description: Constructed by a team of 4 to 5 individuals, this website serves as a platform for a club aimed at facilitating the upload of helpful tips and samples for assignments.
